text: viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam soyuznyky odyn odnym. Vony zakhyshchayutʹ righteousness ta zaboronyayutʹ zlo, vony zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta dayutʹ obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat), ta vony pidkoryayutʹsya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru. Tsey bude showered BOZHYM myloserdyam. BOH ye Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
